content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Entity placement distance error:
  • When placing an entity, confirm that the player’s position is within the allowed range.
- Entity placement collision and spacing error:
  • Ensure there is sufficient spacing and no obstructions (such as nearby entities or unbuildable terrain) when positioning an entity.
- Attribute access error:
  • Access positional attributes as properties rather than invoking them as functions.
- Insufficient inventory for placement:
  • Verify that the required entity is present in the inventory before attempting placement.
- Technology prerequisite error:
  • Complete all necessary research before crafting items that depend on specific technology unlocks (for example, crafting an assembling-machine-1 requires automation technology).
- Sub-ingredient availability error:
  • Prior to initiating complex crafting operations, ensure that all required sub-ingredients (such as copper-plate for automation science packs and iron-plate for iron gear wheels) are available or have been properly processed via smelting or assembly.
